---

**Background and Overview**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure a Truck Fire Fighting Pumper, specified under the UNSPSC 25101704 and 46191600 codes. The Crown retained the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.

**Solicitation Documents**

Available tender documents, including the original request for proposal (RFP), RFP amendments 1-3, and associated attachments, are accessible at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8486/

**Tender Description**

Amendment 003 aims to provide clarification and respond to questions from potential suppliers. The solicitation has been amended to reflect the questions received, with specific changes to Annex A (Purchase Description) and Attachment 1 to Part 4 (Technical Evaluation Matrix).

Amendment 002 extends the solicitation closing date to October 31, 2023.

Amendment 001 extends the solicitation closing date to October 11, 2023.

**Submission Instructions**

Bids must be submitted electronically via email to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca. For details, please see the Electronic Submission of Bids section in the solicitation document.

**Language of Submission**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Tender Status**

Tender status: Expired.
